SELECT p.*, d.departmentName FROM Professor p LEFT JOIN Department d ON p.departmentId = d.id WHERE d.departmentName = #{departmentName}
mapper.insert: INSERT Professor (id, name, email, departmentId, password) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{departmentId}, #{password})
mapper.update: UPDATE professor SET email = #{email}, password = #{password} WHERE id=#{id}
